resources.string: Congratulations! You made it to the highscore.\nPlease insert your name to enter the highscore or skip if you\'re too cool for it.

To control the snake you have to tilt the phone.\nWhen the level begins, the phone is flat in your hand and then tilt it up to 45 degrees in any angle.\nTo pause the game press the menu or back button.
Select Level\nYou can only select levels that you has player before.
